com.googlecode.sarasvati
Interface JoinResult

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompleteJoinResult, IncompleteJoinResult, MergeJoinResult
public interface JoinResult

Encapsulates the results of a join attempt. Includes whether or not the join is complete. If the join is complete, also includes the list of arc tokens which completed the join.

Author:
Paul Lorenz

Method Summary
 Collection<ArcToken> getArcTokensCompletingJoin()
          Returns the ArcTokens which were required to complete this join.
 JoinAction getJoinAction()
          Returns the action that the join strategy wants to take.
 NodeToken getMergeTarget()
          If the join action is JoinAction.Merge, then the arc token in question will be made into a parent of the given NodeToken.
 

Method Detail

getJoinAction

JoinAction getJoinAction()
Returns the action that the join strategy wants to take.

Returns:
the action that the join strategy wants to take.

getArcTokensCompletingJoin

Collection<ArcToken> getArcTokensCompletingJoin()
Returns the ArcTokens which were required to complete this join. In the case of a join action of JoinAction.Complete these tokens will will be the parents of the new NodeToken. In the case of a join action of JoinAction.Merge, these tokens will be added as parents to the most recent non-backtracked node token created on this node.

Returns:
The ArcTokens which were required to complete this join, and will be considered the parents of the new NodeToken.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - If this is invoked for an action of JoinAction.Nothing.

getMergeTarget

NodeToken getMergeTarget()
If the join action is JoinAction.Merge, then the arc token in question will be made into a parent of the given NodeToken.

Returns:
The node token into whose history the arc token will be merged into.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - If this is invoked for a non-merge join action
